00042 public abstract class Viewer
00043 {
00044         private static final String defaultEncoding = "iso-8859-1";
00045 
00054         public static String getHtmlCode(AbstractEntity entity, String moduleName,
00055                         String actionName)
00056         {
00057                 String viewerHtml = "";
00058                 if (entity instanceof BaseViewerData)
00059                         viewerHtml += BaseViewer.getTopHtmlCode((BaseViewerData) entity);
00060 
00061                 if (entity instanceof FloorViewable)
00062                         viewerHtml += FloorViewer.getHtmlCode((FloorViewable) entity);
00063                 else if (entity instanceof PromptViewerData)
00064                         viewerHtml += PromptViewer.getHtmlCode((PromptViewerData) entity);
00065                 else if (entity instanceof ForwardViewable)
00066                         viewerHtml += ForwardViewer.getHtmlCode((ForwardViewable) entity);
00067                 else if (entity instanceof AlertViewable)
00068                         viewerHtml += AlertViewer.getHtmlCode((AlertViewable) entity);
00069                 else if (entity instanceof StaticTextViewable)
00070                         viewerHtml += StaticTextViewer
00071                                         .getHtmlCode((StaticTextViewable) entity);
00072                 else if (entity instanceof GridViewerData)
00073                         viewerHtml += GridViewer.getHtmlCode((GridViewerData) entity);
00074                 else if (entity instanceof ImgViewerData)
00075                         viewerHtml += ImgViewer.getHtmlCode((ImgViewerData) entity);
00076                 else if (entity instanceof SplashScreen)
00077                         viewerHtml += SplashScreenViewer.getHtmlCode((SplashScreen) entity);
00078                 else if (entity instanceof BandDiagramViewable)
00079                         viewerHtml += BandDiagramViewer
00080                                         .getHtmlCode((BandDiagramViewable) entity);
00081                 else if (entity == null)
00082                         viewerHtml += "<!-- page vide -->";
00083                 else
00084                         throw new ViewerException("Couldn't find proper viewer for entity");
00085 
00086                 if (entity instanceof BaseViewerData)
00087                         viewerHtml += BaseViewer.getBottomHtmlCode((BaseViewerData) entity);
00088 
00089                 return getHeader(moduleName, actionName) + getLeftMenu(moduleName)
00090                                 + viewerHtml + getFooter();
00091         }
00092 
00102         public static String getHeader(String moduleName, String actionName)
00103 
00104         {
00105                 String pageTitle = buildPageTitle(moduleName, actionName);
00106 
00107                 String header = "";
00108                 header += "<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN\" \"http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd\">"
00109                                 + "<html xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" xml:lang=\"fr\" >"
00110                                 + "<head><title>"
00111                                 + pageTitle
00112                                 + "</title>"
00113                                 + "<meta http-equiv=\"Content-Type\" content=\"text/html; charset="
00114                                 + Viewer.getEncoding() + "\" />";
00115 
00116                 // css******************************************************************
00117                 header += "<link rel=\"stylesheet\" type=\"text/css\" title=\"base\" href=\""
00118                                 + ConfigManager.loadStringProperty("style-screen")
00119                                 + "\" media=\"screen\" />";
00120                 header += "<link rel=\"stylesheet\" type=\"text/css\" title=\"base\" href=\""
00121                                 + ConfigManager.loadStringProperty("style-print")
00122                                 + "\" media=\"print\" />";
00123                 header += "</head><body>";
00124 
00125                 if (ConfigManager.loadBoolProperty("show-top-title", true))
00126                         header += "<div id=\"header\"><h1>" + pageTitle + "</h1></div>";
00127 
00128                 return header;
00129         }
00130 
00131         private static String buildTopMenu()
00132         {
00133                 String html = "";
00134 
00135                 html += "<div class=\"topMenu\">";
00136 
00137                 if (Authentication.getCurrentUserName().equals("unLogedUser"))
00138                 {
00139                         // html += "<a href=\"" + new ActionLink. + "\">Login</a>";
00140                         ActionLink actionLink = new ActionLink("Login", new Login());
00141                         html += LinkViewer.getHtmlCode(actionLink);
00142                 }
00143                 else
00144                 {
00145                         html += Authentication.getCurrentUserName();
00146 
00147                         html += " | ";
00148 
00149                         ActionLink actionLink = new ActionLink("Logout", new Logout());
00150                         html += LinkViewer.getHtmlCode(actionLink);
00151                 }
00152 
00153                 html += "</div>";
00154 
00155                 return html;
00156         }
00157 
00158         private static String buildPageTitle(String moduleName, String actionName)
00159 
00160         {
00161                 String title = ConfigManager.loadStringProperty("display-name");
00162 
00163                 if (moduleName != null && !moduleName.equals("null"))
00164                         title += " - " + moduleName;
00165                 if (actionName != null && !actionName.equals("null"))
00166                         title += " : " + actionName;
00167 
00168                 return title;
00169         }
00170 
00177         public static String getLeftMenu(String moduleName)
00178         {
00179                 Iterator<String> keys = ListModule.getAllModules().iterator();
00180 
00181                 String menuModuleHtml = "";
00182 
00183                 String menu = "<div class=\"element_menu\"><!-- Cadre englobant tous les sous-menus -->";
00184                 menuModuleHtml += "<h3>Modules</h3> <!-- Titre du sous-menu -->"
00185                                 + "<ul>";
00186                 String modNameFromIterator = "";
00187 
00188                 // pour l'instant un seul sous-menu, autres sous-menus à déterminer
00189                 while (keys.hasNext())
00190                 {
00191                         modNameFromIterator = keys.next();
00192 
00193                         Module module = ListModule.getModule(modNameFromIterator);
00194                         if (module.isVisible())
00195                         {
00196                                 if (modNameFromIterator.equals(moduleName))
00197                                 {
00198                                         menuModuleHtml += "<li><span class=\"selectedLink\">"
00199                                                         + module.getVisibleName() + "</span><ul>";
00200 
00201                                         for (String globalActionName : module
00202                                                         .getGlobalActionMenuOrReturnDefaultBehavior()
00203                                                         .getKeyList())
00204                                         {
00205                                                 AbstractAction defaultAction = module
00206                                                                 .getGlobalActionMenuOrReturnDefaultBehavior()
00207                                                                 .get(globalActionName);
00208 
00209                                                 String currentLinkHtml = LinkViewer
00210                                                                 .getHtmlCode(new ActionLink(globalActionName,
00211                                                                                 defaultAction));
00212 
00213                                                 if (currentLinkHtml.length() > 0)
00214                                                         menuModuleHtml += "<li>" + currentLinkHtml
00215                                                                         + "</li>";
00216                                         }
00217 
00218                                         for (ActionLink button : module.getGlobalActionButtonList())
00219                                         {
00220                                                 String currentLinkHtml = ButtonLinkViewer
00221                                                                 .getHtmlCode(button);
00222                                                 if (currentLinkHtml != null
00223                                                                 && currentLinkHtml.length() > 0)
00224                                                         menuModuleHtml += "<li>" + currentLinkHtml
00225                                                                         + "</li>";
00226                                         }
00227                                 }
00228                                 else
00229                                 {
00230                                         menuModuleHtml += "<li><a href=\""
00231                                                         + Servlet.makeLink(module) + "\">"
00232                                                         + module.getVisibleName() + "</a><ul>";
00233                                 }
00234 
00235                                 menuModuleHtml += "</ul></li>";
00236                         }
00237                 }
00238                 menuModuleHtml += "</ul>";
00239 
00240                 menuModuleHtml = menuModuleHtml.replace("<ul></ul>", "");
00241 
00242                 // ferme menu gauche + <div id="body">=style css corp de droite
00243                 return (menu + menuModuleHtml + "</div> <div id=\"body\">" + buildTopMenu());
00244         }
00245 
00252         public static String getFooter()
00253         {
00254                 String footer = "</div><div id=\"footer\"><p>Copyright © \"G.Lacasse, J.Cloutier, J.Hallée, P.Lemay, G.Therrien\" 2009, tous droits réservés</p></div></body></html>";
00255                 return footer;
00256         }
00257 
00261         public static String getEncoding()
00262         {
00263                 return defaultEncoding;
00264         }
